title: The Real Hustle S02E11 The 12 Scams of Christmas
description:
The Real Hustle (UK) - The 12 Scams of Christmas

The Real Hustle team demonstrate some of the classic cons that take place at winter time.
This is the 2006 Christmas special, aired as the 11th episode in series 2.
